recipe.title: Fresh Pea Hummus Crostini with Pea Tendril Garnish
ingredients: 1 1/4 cups fresh shelled green peas (from 1 1/2 pounds peas in pod)
instructions: Puree first 8 ingredients in processor until almost smooth. Brush toasts with olive oil and top with pea hummus. Garnish with pea tendrils.
Puree first 8 ingredients in processor until almost smooth. Brush toasts with olive oil and top with pea hummus. Garnish with pea tendrils.
